caption:
Allow us to introduce LMNT Lemonade Salt 🍋

Sweet. Tart. Refreshing. Made for summer. Lemonade Salt captures that unmistakable sense of summer freedom — from sidewalk lemonade stands to sun-soaked adventures.

Active LMNT INSIDERS get first dibs. Get yours at our link in bio, or add it to your first INSIDER Bundle to snag early access 😎
